almost_done_copy: 所有介面皆可依您的需求來調整，以下為此欄位可利用的選項。
almost_done_options: 就快完成了! 請確認以下選項。
batch_delete_confirm: 沒有選取任何項目 | 是否確定要刪除此項目? 此動作無法還原。 | 是否確定要刪除這{count} 個項目? 此動作無法還原。
bookmark_global: 全部: 為所有使用者儲存
cant_disable_primary: 您無法對即有的欄位停用主键。請直接刪除該欄位。
choose_interface: Choose an interface for how this data should be managed.
click_to_toggle_all_none: Click to toggle entire column on/off
collection_names_cannot_be_changed: Collection names cannot be edited at this time.
config_error_copy: Make sure you've created the application's configuration file
database_connection_copy: Next, we need to know how to connect to the database where this project will be managed.

mysql.BIGINT: An integer. When signed (allows negative) length is -9,223,372,036,854,775,808 to 9,223,372,036,854,775,807, otherwise the max is 18,446,744,073,709,551,615.
mysql.BOOLEAN: True or false. Is saved as either 1 or 0 respectively.
mysql.CHAR: A fixed-length non-binary string right-padded with spaces. Length can be 0 to 255 characters.
mysql.DECIMAL: An accurate number (eg: for currency), with 1 to 65 digits length (L) and 0 to 30 digits decimal (D). Length format: `L,D`
mysql.DOUBLE: An approximate binary number, 8 bytes with a floating decimal point.
mysql.FLOAT: An approximate binary number, 4 bytes with a floating decimal point.
mysql.INT: An integer. When signed (allows negative) length is -2,147,483,648 to 2,147,483,647, otherwise the max is 4,294,967,295.
mysql.LONGTEXT: A string with a max length of 4,294,967,295 characters.
mysql.MEDIUMINT: An integer. When signed (allows negative) length is -8,388,608 to 8,388,607, otherwise the max is 16,777,215.
mysql.MEDIUMTEXT: A string with a max length of 16,777,215 characters.
mysql.SMALLINT: An integer. When signed (allows negative) length is -32,768 to 32,767, otherwise the max is 65,535.
mysql.TEXT: A string with a max length of 65,535 characters.
mysql.TINYINT: An integer. When signed (allows negative) length is -128 to 127, otherwise the max is 255.
mysql.TINYTEXT: A string with a max length of 255 characters.
mysql.VARCHAR: A variable-length non-binary string. Length can be 0 to 65,535 characters (MySQL 5.0.3+).

delete_are_you_sure: Are you sure you want to delete this item? This action can not be undone.
delete_bookmark_body: Are you sure you want to delete this bookmark? This action cannot be undone.
delete_collection_are_you_sure: Are you sure you want to delete this collection? This action can not be undone.
delete_field_are_you_sure: Are you sure you want to delete the field "{field}"? This action can not be undone.
delete_role_are_you_sure: Are you sure to delete the role "{name}"? This action cannot be undone.
dont_manage_copy: Privileges, preferences, and settings for the {collection} collection will be permanently removed from the system! Are you sure?
drop_files: Can't Drop Files | Drop file here... | Drop files here...
empty_collection_body: There are no items in this collection yet
error_unknown: 未知的錯誤，請稍候再試

errors.100: 錯誤的使用者名稱或密碼
errors.106: 錯誤的使用者名稱或密碼

esc_cancel: Escape will cancel and close the window.
extension_error: There was a problem loading the {ext} extension.
extensions_missing_copy: Make sure you have the system extensions installed.
field_width_note: The width of this field within the form's layout. Widths wrap differently, so form placement may also be affected (in combination with the field's sort value).

fieldtypes.alias: Fields that do not save data or do not have corresponding database columns
fieldtypes.array: Standard array format in API response
fieldtypes.datetime: A date and time in ISO format, eg: 2018-09-19T14:00:43.381Z
fieldtypes.datetime_created: System field to track the datetime an item was created, used by revisions
fieldtypes.datetime_updated: System field to track the datetime an item was updated, used by revisions
fieldtypes.group: Groups fields together visually, children save group into directus_fields.group
fieldtypes.json: Standard JSON format in API response
fieldtypes.lang: Specific to translation interfaces, this stores the language key
fieldtypes.sort: System field used in drag-and-drop item reordering
fieldtypes.status: System field used for publishing workflows
fieldtypes.string: Any text, numbers, spaces, or symbols; defined and limited by its length (number of characters)
fieldtypes.translation: Specific to translation interfaces, this o2m is stores multi-lingual content
fieldtypes.user_created: System field to track the user who created an item, used by revisions
fieldtypes.user_updated: System field to track the user who updated an item, used by revisions

file_type_not_accepted: {filename} can't be uploaded. It is not a valid file type for this field.
initial_schema_copy: Choose from existing database architectures or start fresh. You can always extend and tweak this later.
install_copy: This API has not been setup yet. Would you like to install and configure it now?
intelligent_defaults: Advanced options lets you configure how data will be stored in the database and tweak additional app settings.
interface_has_no_options: This interface doesn't have any options
interface_settings: Every interface can be perfectly tailored to your needs. Below are the available options for this interface, but only some are required.
length_disabled_placeholder: Length is determined by the datatype
max_one_primary_key: You can only have 1 primary key field per collection
name: 名稱
name_bookmark: What would you like to name this bookmark?
name_field: Let’s name this {field} field and add a helpful note for users.
navigate_changes: Are you sure you want to leave this page? The changes you made will be lost if you navigate away from this page.
no_collections_body: It seems like there aren't any collections setup yet
no_fields_body: It seems like this collection doesn't have any fields setup yet
no_files_body: It seems like there haven't been any files uploaded yet
no_interface_error: Field {field} doesn't have an interface setup
no_results_body: The current filters do not match any collection items
note_icon: The icon shown in the App's navigation sidebar
page_not_found_body: The page you are looking for doesn't seem to exist.
permissions_admin: Admins have access to all managed data within the system by default.
permissions_no_collections: This project does not have any collections yet.
project_info_copy: Below are a few questions about your project, including the credentials of your first administrator.
readable_fields_copy: Select the fields that the user can view
relation_setup: Since this is a relational field, we need to map-out the related fields.
relation_setup_copy: There are different types of relational data, this interface uses one called {relation}.
relationship_not_setup: The relationship hasn't been configured correctly.
revert_copy: Do you want to revert this item to how it was on {date}?
select_statuses_copy: Select the statuses the user can use
server_error_copy: Something is wrong with this instance’s server or database.
server_trouble_copy: Try again later or contact your system administrator help.
settings_update_database_confirm: This will update your database schema to work with the latest version of Directus. Always create a database backup before running this operation.
sign_out_confirm: Are you sure you want to sign out?
sign_out_confirm_edits: Are you sure you want to sign out? All unsaved changes will be lost.
something_went_wrong_body: Trouble processing request. Try again after refreshing the page.
unsaved_changes_copy: You have unsaved changes! Are you sure you want to leave this page?
update_confirm: Are you sure you want to update {count} items?
upload_exceeds_max_size: {filename} can't be uploaded. Your server is not configured to handle uploads of this size.
user_edit_warning: {first_name} {last_name} is editing this item too. Please coordinate with them so you don't lose your changes.
writable_fields_copy: Select the fields that the user can edit
